column1: Definition: Measures how ready, able, and willing the prospect is to make a decision now.

column5: Sample Question
column6: Example Prospect Answer

column5: "Is this your decision to make on your own?"
column6: "I’ll probably need to talk it through with my mom and best friend."

column5: "Who else influences this decision?"
column6: "I usually check with a friend or two before big investments."

column5: "Are you the one who ultimately decides if you move forward?"
column6: "Yes. If I feel it’s right, I decide."

column5: "Do you make the final call on solutions like this?"
column6: "Not really — I just gather info for our director."

column5: "What’s your role in the decision-making process?"
column6: "I’m part of the shortlisting group, but final approval is with leadership."

column5: "Can you greenlight this if it fits?"
column6: "Yes, I manage the budget and sign-off."

column5: "Is there anyone else who needs to agree to the sale?"
column6: "My ex and I co-own the house, and we’re not aligned."

column5: "Do you need input from family before accepting offers?"
column6: "My parents are helping with advice."

column5: "Are you the sole decision maker on selling this property?"
column6: "Yes. It’s in my name — I’m ready to make a move."

column5: "How long do you usually take to decide on coaching?"
column6: "I sit with it for weeks or months."

column5: "When something feels important, how fast do you act?"
column6: "I like to think about it for a few days."

column5: "When you know something’s right, what happens?"
column6: "I act fast. Once it clicks, I’m in."

column5: "How long do decisions like this take?"
column6: "Months — lots of red tape."

column5: "What’s your average approval timeline?"
column6: "Usually a few weeks after review."

column5: "When leadership is aligned, how fast do you go?"
column6: "We can approve within days."

column5: "How do you approach major decisions?"
column6: "Very cautiously. I need a lot of time."

column5: "When you bought this home, how long did it take?"
column6: "We took a couple weeks to compare options."

column5: "How fast do you decide when it feels right?"
column6: "Immediately. I move when the deal makes sense."

column5: "Is this something you feel must change?"
column6: "Not really. Just curious."

column5: "How ready are you to address this?"
column6: "I think I’m ready to take it more seriously."

column5: "What makes now the right time to do something about it?"
column6: "I’m done tolerating it. This changes now."

column5: "Is this a firm initiative or early research?"
column6: "More early-stage — we’re exploring."

column5: "How committed is your team to solving this this quarter?"
column6: "We’re committed but juggling priorities."

column5: "Is this something you’re planning to fix no matter what?"
column6: "Yes. The team is aligned — it must happen."

column5: "Are you definitely planning to sell, or just exploring?"
column6: "Just testing the waters."

column5: "Are you leaning toward listing soon?"
column6: "Yes, but we still have a few things to figure out."

column5: "What happens if you don’t sell soon?"
column6: "That’s not an option — we’re moving regardless."

column5: "How do you make important decisions?"
column6: "I second-guess a lot. I go back and forth."

column5: "Logic or feeling — what drives your decisions?"
column6: "Bit of both. I think a lot before I act."

column5: "When something feels aligned, what happens next?"
column6: "I get clear fast. I trust myself and go."

column5: "Data-driven or consensus-based process?"
column6: "Mostly consensus, which can take a while."

column5: "Typical buying framework?"
column6: "We like ROI models and peer input."

column5: "Decision process when it’s a clear fit?"
column6: "If ROI is strong and pain is clear, we greenlight fast."

column5: "How did you decide to buy this home?"
column6: "Wasn’t sure — long debate."

column5: "How do you approach big financial decisions?"
column6: "We weigh pros/cons and talk it through."

column5: "When numbers and timing align, how do you decide?"
column6: "We move quickly. We’ve done this before and know what to look for."
